mapper.sql: stat_num , stat_date , com_acc , emp_id , emp_name , exp_id , exp_num , appl_date , appr_date , appr , expense , income
mapper.select: SELECT stat_num , exp_title , stat_date , sum(expense) AS expense , income FROM acv LEFT OUTER JOIN expreport ON acv.exp_num = expreport.exp_num AND stat_date >= #{startDate} AND stat_date <= #{endDate} AND appr_state = '승인' AND exp_title is not NULL GROUP BY com_acc, stat_num, stat_date, income ORDER BY stat_num DESC

SELECT expreport.exp_num , emp_name , remk , appr , appr_date , com_acc , expense FROM acv INNER JOIN expreport ON acv.exp_num = expreport.exp_num INNER JOIN emp_table ON acv.emp_id = emp_table.emp_id WHERE acv.stat_num = #{statNum};
SELECT SUM(Meal_exp + trn_exp + wel_exp - tax) AS payTotal, paymdate FROM payrollhistory WHERE paymdate >= #{startDate} AND paymdate <= #{endDate} GROUP BY paymdate ORDER BY paymdate DESC
